docs.text: Welcome to MkDocs For full documentation visit mkdocs.org . Commands mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project. mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server. mkdocs build - Build the documentation site. mkdocs help - Print this help message. Project layout mkdocs.yml # The configuration file. docs/ index.md # The documentation homepage. ... # Other markdown pages, images and other files.
docs.title: Accueil

docs.text: mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project. mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server. mkdocs build - Build the documentation site. mkdocs help - Print this help message.
docs.title: Commands

docs.text: mkdocs.yml # The configuration file. docs/ index.md # The documentation homepage. ... # Other markdown pages, images and other files.
docs.title: Project layout

docs.text: Notes Installtion Mkdcos Premiers essai Sur un container de build docker run -it -v $HOME:/root/mkdocs-test python:2.7 pip install mkdocs-material cd /root/mkdocs-test mkdocs build Sur un conteneur de service HTTP : docker run -dit -v $PWD/site:/usr/local/apache2/htdocs -p 8080:80 httpd Suite git clone lerepo cd lerepo docker run --rm -it -v ${PWD}:/docs squidfunk/mkdocs-material build docker run -dit -p 8080:80 -v $PWD/site :/usr/local/apache2/htdocs/ httpd
docs.title: Installation

docs.text: Sur un container de build docker run -it -v $HOME:/root/mkdocs-test python:2.7 pip install mkdocs-material cd /root/mkdocs-test mkdocs build Sur un conteneur de service HTTP : docker run -dit -v $PWD/site:/usr/local/apache2/htdocs -p 8080:80 httpd
docs.title: Premiers essai

docs.text: git clone lerepo cd lerepo docker run --rm -it -v ${PWD}:/docs squidfunk/mkdocs-material build docker run -dit -p 8080:80 -v $PWD/site :/usr/local/apache2/htdocs/ httpd
docs.title: Suite
